alerts.clearReset: Dette vil tømme lerretet. Er du sikker?
alerts.cannotExportEmptyCanvas: Kan ikke eksportere et tomt lerret.
alerts.couldNotCopyToClipboard: Kunne ikke kopiere til utklippstavlen. Prøv med nettleseren Chrome.
alerts.uploadedSecurly: Opplastingen er kryptert og kan ikke leses av Excalidraw-serveren eller tredjeparter.

hints.linearElement: Klikk for å starte linje med flere punkter, eller dra for en enkel linje
hints.linearElementMulti: Trykk Escape eller Enter for å fullføre
hints.resize: Du kan låse proporsjonene ved å holde nede Shift mens du endrer størrelsen

errorSplash.clearCanvasCaveat: This will result in loss of work
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_pre: Before doing so, we'd appreciate if you opened an issue on our
errorSplash.openIssueMessage_post: Please include the following error stack trace (and if it's not private, also the scene content):

roomDialog.desc_intro: You can invite people to your current scene to collaborate with you.
roomDialog.desc_privacy: Don't worry, the session uses end-to-end encryption, so whatever you draw will stay private. Not even our server will be able to see what you come up with.
roomDialog.desc_start: To begin, click the button below. (Will use the current scene. If you don't want this, you can manually clear it, first)
roomDialog.desc_inProgressIntro: Live-collaboration session is now in progress.
roomDialog.desc_persistenceWarning: Note that the scene data is shared across collaborators in a P2P fashion, and not persisted to our server. Thus, if all of you disconnect, you will loose the data unless you export it to a file or a shareable link.
roomDialog.desc_shareLink: Share this link with anyone you want to collaborate with:
roomDialog.desc_exitSession: Stopping the session will disconnect your from the room, but you'll be able to continue working with the scene, locally. Note that this won't affect other people, and they'll still be able to collaborate on their version.
